reviews.review_msg: Probably the smartest professor at SFU.   She should definitely be better recognized and appreciated by the school. This is a 'must' course for SFU psyc majors. Not because it is easy, (it isn't) but because it is informative and so well organized.

She is one of the best prof I have ever had. She is so passionate in this course and she knows a lot about everything. Even though the material is not easy, but i absolutely enjoyed the course. She is very helpful and everything was very organized. If you are interested in memory, you wouldnt wanna miss this course.

Dr. Barha knew what she was talking about but often spoke too fast and went through the slides too fast. The text for this class was difficult to read and unfortunately a lot of exam questions were taken from it.  Read the text AND read the slides in order to do well.
